fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Compare two souls to discover their compatibility
-Shift the souls of two players (1-shot)
-Discover the last emotions of dying souls (Passive)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-When discovering two souls' compatibility, you will see if they win together. This may be used with any two roles, even if one is mod confirmed.
-You may choose to add one of the following changes to the win conditions of each of the players whose souls you shift:
`"[X] must survive."
"[X] must die."`
Where [X] is the other player targeted.
-When a player dies during the night, they may send a message consisting of up to 10 emojis (and only emojis) to you. These must be sent to you during the next Day Phase.
